attributes.action: Free NHS IVF treatment for step parents and single people.
attributes.additional_details:
IVF is currently only available to couples who have no biological or adopted children under the age of 42. 

i.e if you meet a person with children and become a step parent you are automatically discounted from the option of receiving NHS IVF treatment even if you have no biological children of your own. 

In my case I am undergoing investigation for polycystic ovaries and endometriosis having not conceived in 2 years. I am not eligible because my partner has children from a prior relationship
attributes.background: Make IVF available on the NHS to people who are step parents but have no biological children of their own, to single people who wish to use donor sperm/surrogate and parents who have an adopted child.
